title: The System, Privilege, and Personal Responsibility with Roc
description:
"The health of a society is not determined by the top rungs, rather by the bottom." Excellent chat with Roc on why their have been racial tensions over the past few weeks, and how understanding the history of black people in America is key.
Listen to podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/The-System--Privilege--and-Personal-Responsibility-with-Roc-eieng1
Follow Roc on Twitter @TheRocsWorld
Follow me on Twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
